text: I have built a Shopify integration with a HubSpot module. This basically crawls the client's Shopify URL for products within a collection and renders it on a HubSpot page so that the user can Add to Cart from any landing page. I want to pass the collection id from Shopify into the javascript via HUBL. How can I do this?

So in the javascript, I just have a variable where I manually put the collection id from Shopify (it's just a string of 11 numbers. I want to swap out that id with a HUBL text field so that we can keep reusing the model for different products throughout the website. Right now, I just duplicate the module and manually edit the id, but I would like just one module that we can change via a text field for the user...any thoughts?
